mapper.select: select ri.id, ri.category_id, ri.brand_id, ri.price, ri.deposit_id, ri.pay_id, ri.deposite_amount, ri.pay_amount, ri.total_amount, ri.water_bill, ri.electricity_bill, ri.house_type_id,square, ri.floor, ri.towards, ri.elevator, ri.furnish, ri.home_page_image,ri.introduction, ri.address_id, ri.room_no,ri.address_detail, ri.facilities, ri.labels, ri.favorite_count, ri.browse_count, ri.status, ri.deleted, ri.weights, ri.sort, ri.create_by, ri.create_time, ri.update_by, ri.update_time, rb.`name` brand_name, rc.`name` category_name, rht.`name` house_type_name,rd.`name` deposit_name, rp.`name` pay_name, rp.id as sub_id, rp.pic_url as sub_pic_url, rp.sort as sub_sort from residence_info ri left join residence_brand rb on ri.brand_id = rb.id left join residence_category rc on ri.category_id = rc.id left join residence_house_type rht on ri.house_type_id = rht.id left join residence_deposit rd on ri.deposit_id = rd.id left join residence_pay rp on ri.pay_id = rp.id left join residence_picture rp on rp.residence_id = ri.id where ri.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into residence_info
category_id, brand_id, price, deposit_id, pay_id, deposite_amount, pay_amount, total_amount, water_bill, electricity_bill, house_type_id, square, floor, towards, elevator, furnish, home_page_image, introduction, address_id, room_no, address_detail, facilities, labels, favorite_count, browse_count, status, deleted, weights, sort, create_by, create_time,
#{categoryId}, #{brandId}, #{price}, #{depositId}, #{payId}, #{depositeAmount}, #{payAmount}, #{totalAmount}, #{waterBill}, #{electricityBill}, #{houseTypeId}, #{square}, #{floor}, #{towards}, #{elevator}, #{furnish}, #{homePageImage}, #{introduction}, #{addressId}, #{roomNo}, #{addressDetail}, #{facilities}, #{labels}, #{favoriteCount}, #{browseCount}, #{status}, #{deleted}, #{weights}, #{sort}, #{createBy}, #{createTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from residence_info where id in
#{id}

delete from residence_picture where residence_id in
#{residenceId}
mapper.insert:
insert into residence_picture( id, residence_id, pic_url, sort) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.residenceId}, #{item.picUrl}, #{item.sort})
mapper.update:
update residence_info set `status` = #{status},update_by = #{updateBy},update_time = #{updateTime} where id in
#{id}
